name: Lucy Liuper (Dream Looper)
description:
Little Lucy has lost her teddy bear and is stuck in a recurring loop trying to find him! Help Lucy with the help of her past selves and find the teddy bear, so she can sleep peacefully.

CONTROLS
  • WSAD / ARROWS - Controls Lucy’s movement
  • Space - Jump
  • E - Interact (e.g use near a lever to switch)
  • R - Lucy falls asleep to start another day

You can also use a controller though it is not tested so any button can be anything.

NOTES

This game was made for Ludum Dare 47 - Stuck in a Loop - and we didn't really have the time we needed, so it is missing audio and more puzzles. But hope you enjoy this state of the game as well!
